nodes.text: Lieutenant Governor (Lt. Gov.) was the title of a governing position, typically planetary in nature, although exceptions existed. Lieutenant governors generally served as seconds-in-command to governors. They were also known as Vice-Governor.

Lieutenant Governors include Wilhuff Tarkin, lieutenant governor of Eriadu and the Seswenna sector in 33 BBY and Hamman Flatt, lieutenant governor of Abridon in 3 ABY. In 8 ABY, Marja Lang served as Vice-Governor of Gandle Ott.
